title: Uppercase names should be treated as the same priority in sorting as lower case names
body:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f4cff665-06d0-4b76-8dbc-815d5c2b4501)

HI @SoongMingLiang 

https://ultiscore.com/tournaments/u24-men-and-women-championship/teams/622

can you help to fix this sort by name toggle. When toggle to sort by name, the uppercase names have greater presedence over the lower case names. 
Can fix this in app router branch?

Applies to any pages that have name sorting, like MVPs take, stats tab, teams tab to sort team name etc. Double check the pages. 

Thanks.

title: Fix Crew Image on mobile
body: Crew profile picture on the crew admin page is not circle. this applies only on mobile/responsive view of a certain dimension. Similar to like last time player.

title: Fix Claim rejected profile
body:
i think we can drop the database unique player id constraint, then we add checking the claim logic where, it will be like:
whenever a user claim a profile say player_id = 10 -> backend check are there any existing rows in the table.
if no player_id = 10, then we let player make a request to claim profile and create a new row 
if this player_id = 10 exist in our table, we check the status of the row:
    -> if status = 'pending' we dont allow user claim
    -> if status = 'reject' we allow user claim

title: Teams Tab Table Changes
body:
**Teams Tab**
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/41238472-4507-4211-9ac2-22b4e01c4c0e)

https://ultiscore.com/tournaments/singapore-mixed-nationals-2024-division-1/teams

Currently have a division column. Change that column to show the number of players of the team. 
Column header (try to find an icon that's something like this https://thenounproject.com/icon/people-6219987/)

Number of players should display based on accepted invite players only and also players who are added to DB directly. 

If a team accidentally have repeated player ID in the player_team table, should only count once. 
Pending players should not be counted. 



**Inside Team Page**
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/dd059e89-b796-4532-bc0f-1d86369e4ecd)

https://ultiscore.com/tournaments/singapore-mixed-nationals-2024-division-1/teams/104

- Put Total Players in 12px text size below the team name (which is the one next to the logo image).
- Text will Align with the start of the team name. 



**Inside Team Admin Page**
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6b98b30a-b2cc-4ddb-b58e-ab843103f7f6)

https://ultiscore.com/tournaments/singapore-mixed-nationals-2024-division-1/teams/970/team-admin
- Put Total Players in 12px text size below the team name (which is the one next to the image).
- Put Rosters Received in 12px text size below the team name (which is the one next to the logo image).
- Text will Align with the start of the team name.

Reference is this https://live.wbucc.org/spirit?view=live/index

Column arrangement (left to right): Avg, Rules, Fouls, Fair, Attit, Comm

Spirit Score Table Result should make it scrollable to the right. 

Page affected:

- [ ] Spirit Result in spirit tab (https://ultiscore.com/tournaments/singapore-mixed-nationals-2024-division-2/spirit)
- [ ] Spirit Result in Tournament Dashboard (https://ultiscore.com/tournaments/singapore-mixed-nationals-2024-division-2/tournament-admin?selectedButton=spirit&selectedTab=results)

title: Confirm button at end the match can be double clicked.
body:
Right now, AFTER the scorekeeper key in their name in the pop up modal (after they click end the match), the confirm button can be clicked multiple times after it's clicked. 

Fix it so that once it's clicked, it can't be click again. This is user wont' click it many times if internet is a bit slow and user will just wait for it to load.

title: Show mvp bug
body:
If set show_mvp = 0 in database, scorekeeper unable to record mvp for the match and also cannot end the match.

Related to this commit
https://github.com/Menusio/ultiscore-laravel/commit/1e74ed107bae41fcc59e75c03204956225e899ff

As the record mvp frontend didnt get the mvp information if show_mvp = 0 due to above commit
